title: Most popular online dating apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience size
summary: The Most popular Dating in the dating apps was Dating POF_(main) , who made 7.86 size .
The most popular Dating was OkCupid_(main) , with just 0.85 size .

In second place was Dating Bumble with 5.03 size ; third place went to Dating tinder with 7.86 size ; fourth place went to Dating Ashley_Madison with 0.85 size and fifth place went to Dating Match.com_(main) , who was 1.95 size .
gold: As of September 2019 , Tinder reported in an U.S. mobile audience reach of 7.86 million users , making the app the most popular online dating app in the United States . Second-ranked Bumble had 5.03 million U.S. mobile users .
